response.original_title: A Woman is Her Most Beautiful on Her Wedding Day / Someone I Hate
response.overview: Titled both A Woman is Her Most Beautiful on Her Wedding day and Someone I hate, this film draws on the filmmaker/artistâ€™s own upbringing in a more conservative and gender constrained environment. Employing ubiquitous wedding videography x perfume advertisement tropes, the work is a humorous exploration of how the narratives we have absorbed dictate our daily lives, driving our short-term and long-term decisions.
response.title: A Woman is Her Most Beautiful on Her Wedding Day / Someone I Hate
